A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
while the film is riddled with many scenes that don't make much sense\, its overall fantastic set design (in particular the red scenes)\, subversion of typical star wars posts makes this a must watch for any movie fan. My theory for it's low audience score is that the fans can't move past the changes done to characters. However...
a) the series was already 'ruined' by the prequel trilogy
b) if this film would've appealed to the fan's high demands\, everyone else would've noticed it was no different than the last. 
However the casino scene (which only lasts 15 minutes) is pointless and out of place
